str2: Large, great, in the widest sense.
A sudden storm, squall, whirlwind, hurricane. Of uncertain derivation; a whirlwind.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A wave, surge, billow. From kuo (with young), i.e. Bend, curve); a billow.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From epi and ballo; to throw upon; specially to reflect; impersonally, to belong to.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To fill, load. Transitive from gemo; to fill entirely.
